segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even see the water pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how quiet they're being, they must really not want to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, she looks so patient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're going to get away with it, at least for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip, but the boy seems to have it under control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or wake their mother up from her dish drying trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to look down and see the puddle she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR
